text: College Apartments, also known as the Park Central Apartments, is a historic apartment building located at Springfield, Greene County, Missouri. It was originally constructed in 1910 as an expansion to Springfield Business College, and expanded and converted to apartments in 1928. It is a three- story, Commercial Block brick building with Classical details. The building features a flat parapet capped with flat limestone block and three brick pilasters with limestone capitals and plinths. (includes 16 photographs from 2002) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2003. ==References== Category:Residential buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Residential buildings completed in 1928 Category:Buildings and structures in Springfield, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Greene County, Missouri
title: College Apartments
